description: Microsoft Azure Data Factory Resource Types
title: Microsoft.DataFactory

pipelines.description: A logical grouping of Activities. that operate as a unit that together perform a task.

dataFactories.description: The top level DataPipeline resource container.

___location.description: Data center location of the data factory.

___id.description: Resource id of the data factory.  The Id property is set by the server and readonly on the client side.

linkedServices.description: Defines the information needed for Data Factory to connect to external resources.

datasets.description: A named reference/pointer to the data to be used as an input or an output of an Activity. Datasets identify data structures within different data stores including tables, files, folders and documents.

_88fileSystemSink.description: A copy activity file system sink.
_88fileSystemSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.FileSystemSink

$eref.description: All available types of copy behavior.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.CopyBehaviorType

___copyBehavior.description: The type of copy behavior for file system sink.

_88dataLakeAnalyticsUSQLActivity.description: Azure Data Lake Analytics U-SQL activity.
_88dataLakeAnalyticsUSQLActivity.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DataLakeAnalyticsUSQLActivity

___typeProperties.description: Data Lake Analytics U-SQL activity properties.

___script.description: The U-SQL script. This cannot be used at the same time as ScriptPath and ScriptLinkedService.

___degreeOfParallelism.description: The maximum number of nodes that will be used simultaneously to run the job.

___scriptPath.description: The path to the U-SQL script in the ScriptLinkedService. This needs to be used at the same time as ScriptLinkedService.

___runtimeVersion.description: Runtime version of U-SQL engine to use.

___parameters.description: Allows user to specify parameters for the U-SQL activity.

$eref.description: Compilation mode for a U-SQL activity.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.USqlCompilationMode

___compilationMode.description: Compilation mode of U-SQL. Must be one of the USqlCompilationMode

___scriptLinkedService.description: The linked service hosting the U-SQL script. This needs to be used at the same time as ScriptPath.

___priority.description: Determines which jobs out of all that are queued should be selected to run first. The lower the number, the higher the priority (minimum is 0).

_88jsonFormatFilePattern.description: JSON format file pattern. A property of JsonFormat
_88jsonFormatFilePattern.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.JsonFormatFilePattern

_88bzip2Compression.description: The BZip2 compression method used on a dataset.
_88bzip2Compression.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.BZip2Compression

_88onPremisesOdbcLinkedService.description: On-premises Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) linked service.
_88onPremisesOdbcLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.OnPremisesOdbcLinkedService

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

___authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the ODBC data store. Possible values are: Anonymous and Basic.

___connectionString.description: The non-access credential portion of the connection string as well as an optional encrypted credential.

___credential.description: The access credential portion of the connection string specified in driver-specific property-value format.

___concurrency.description: The maximum number of concurrent activity executions.

___executionPriorityOrder.description: Execution priority order.  Choose from OldestFirst or NewestFirst.

___timeout.description: Specifies the timeout for the activity to run. If there is value specified, it takes the value of TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1) which means indefinite timeout.

___delay.description: Delay activity execution so that upstream activities can have extra time to finish.

___retry.description: Total number of short retries for a failed activity.

___longRetry.description: Total number of long retries after failed short retries.

_88documentDbCollectionSink.description: A copy activity Document Database Collection sink.
_88documentDbCollectionSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DocumentDbCollectionSink

___encodingName.description: The code page name of the preferred encoding. If miss, the default value is �utf-8�, unless BOM denotes another Unicode encoding. Refer to the �Name� column of the table in the following link to set supported values: https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.text.encoding.aspx.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

___password.description: The password for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

___username.description: The username for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

___securityToken.description: The security token is required to access Salesforce.

___rejectType.description: Indicates whether the RejectValue property is specified as a literal value or a percentage.

___useTypeDefault.description: Specifies how to handle missing values in delimited text files when PolyBase retrieves data from the text file.

___rejectValue.description: Specifies the value or the percentage of rows that can be rejected before the query fails.

___rejectSampleValue.description: Determines the number of rows to attempt to retrieve before the PolyBase recalculates the percentage of rejected rows.

_88webSource.description: A copy activity source for web page table.
_88webSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.WebSource

_88sqlDWSink.description: A copy activity SQL data warehouse sink.
_88sqlDWSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.SqlDWSink

___rejectType.description: Indicates whether the RejectValue property is specified as a literal value or a percentage.

___useTypeDefault.description: Specifies how to handle missing values in delimited text files when PolyBase retrieves data from the text file.

___rejectValue.description: Specifies the value or the percentage of rows that can be rejected before the query fails.

___rejectSampleValue.description: Determines the number of rows to attempt to retrieve before the PolyBase recalculates the percentage of rejected rows.

___polyBaseSettings.description: Specifies PolyBase-related settings when AllowPolyBase is true.

___allowPolyBase.description: Indicates to use PolyBase to copy data into SQL Data Warehouse when applicable.

___sliceIdentifierColumnName.description: Name of the SQL column which is used to save slice identifier information, to support idempotent copy.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

___userName.description: The on-premises Windows authentication user name.

___authenticationType.description: AuthenticationType to be used for connection.

_88jsonFormat.description: The data stored in JSON format.
_88jsonFormat.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.JsonFormat

___nestingSeparator.description: The character used to separate nesting levels. Default value is '.' (dot).

$eref.description: JSON format file pattern. A property of JsonFormat
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.JsonFormatFilePattern

___filePattern.description: File pattern of JSON. To be more specific, the way of separating a collection of JSON objects. The default value is 'setOfObjects'. It is case-sensitive.

___encodingName.description: The code page name of the preferred encoding. If not provided, the default value is 'utf-8', unless the byte order mark (BOM) denotes another Unicode encoding. The full list of supported values can be found in the 'Name' column of the table of encodings in the following reference: https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.text.encoding.aspx#Anchor_5.

___sliceIdentifierColumnName.description: Name of the SQL column which is used to save slice identifier information, to support idempotent copy.

_88azureSqlDataWarehouseTableDataset.description: The Azure SQL data warehouse dataset.
_88azureSqlDataWarehouseTableDataset.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureSqlDataWarehouseTableDataset

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

___tableName.description: The table name of the Azure SQL data warehouse dataset.

___linkedServiceName.description: LinkedService name where the Activity Runs.

___typeProperties.description: Copy activity properties.

___stagingSettings.description: Specifies interim staging settings when EnableStaging is true.

___enableStaging.description: Specifies whether to copy data via an interim staging. Default value is false.

___parallelCopies.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions opened on the source or sink to avoid overloading the data store.

___cloudDataMovementUnits.description: Maximum number of cloud data movement units that can be used to perform this data movement.

___translator.description: Copy activity translator. If not specificed, tabular translator is used.

___typeProperties.description: SQL Stored Procedure activity properties.

___storedProcedureParameters.description: User specified property bag used in Stored Procedure. There is no restriction on the keys or values that can be used. User needs to consume and interpret the content accordingly in their customized Stored Procedure.

$eref.description: Azure ML Web Service batch scoring activity.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLBatchScoringActivity

___typeProperties.description: Azure ML activity properties.

___webServiceParameters.description: Key,Value pairs to be passed to the Azure ML Batch Execution Service Endpoint (these are also referred to as GlobalParameters). Keys must match the names of web service parameters defined in published the Azure ML web service. Values may include ADF macros to be resolved at each slice execution time.

$eref.description: Azure ML Batch Execution Service activity.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLBatchExecutionActivity

___globalParameters.description: Key,Value pairs to be passed to the Azure ML Batch Execution Service Endpoint Keys must match the names of web service parameters defined in the published Azure ML web service. Values may include ADF functions to be resolved at each slice execution time (See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn835056.aspx). Values will be passed in the GlobalParameters property of the Azure ML batch execution request.

___webServiceOutputs.description: Key,Value pairs mapping the Azure ML endpoint's Web Service Output names to names of ADF Blob Tables where the batch execution output should be written. This information will be passed in the WebServiceOutputs property of the Azure ML batch execution request. Mapped Tables must be included in the Activity's Outputs.

___webServiceInput.description: Name of ADF Blob Table giving the input to the batch execution. This information will be passed in the WebServiceInput property of the Azure ML batch execution request.

$eref.description: Azure ML Update Resource management activity.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLUpdateResourceActivity

___trainedModelDatasetName.description: Name of ADF Blob Dataset representing the .ilearner file that will be uploaded by the update operation. The Dataset must be included in this Activity's pipeline Inputs.

___trainedModelName.description: Name of the Trained Model module in the Web Service experiment to be updated.

___typeProperties.description: HDInsight activity properties.

___defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for Hive job request.

___typeProperties.description: HDInsight activity properties.

___defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for the Pig job request.

___defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for mapreduce job request.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

___hdfsConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for Hdfs configuration.

___dataNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Data Node.

___stormConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for Storm configuration.

___oozieConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for oozie configuration.

___hBaseConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for HBase configuration.

___coreConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for core configuration.

___mapReduceConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for mapreduce configuration.

___sshPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the public key to be used for SSH.

___additionalLinkedServiceNames.description: Specify additional Azure storage accounts that need to be accessible from the cluster.

___hiveCustomLibrariesContainer.description: The name of the blob container that contains custom jar files for HIVE consumption.

___sshUserName.description: Gets or sets SSH user name.

___schemaGeneration.description: Define what options to use for generating/altering table for an input and output tables for an HDInsight activity.

___osType.description: Gets or sets the type of operating system installed on cluster nodes.

___hcatalogLinkedServiceName.description: The name of Azure SQL linked service that point to the HCatalog database.

___zookeeperNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Zookeeper Node.

___clusterType.description: Gets or sets the flavor for the HDInsight cluster.

___headNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Head Node.

___yarnConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for YARN configuration.

___sparkConfiguration.description: The Spark service configuration of this HDInsight cluster.

___hiveConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for HIVE configuration.

___webServiceParameters.description: Key,Value pairs to be passed to the Azure ML Batch Execution Service Endpoint (these are also referred to as GlobalParameters). Keys must match the names of web service parameters defined in published the Azure ML web service. Values may include ADF macros to be resolved at each slice execution time.

___nestingSeparator.description: The character used to separate nesting levels. Default value is '.' (dot).

___filePattern.description: File pattern of JSON. To be more specific, the way of separating a collection of JSON objects. The default value is 'setOfObjects'. It is case-sensitive.

___encodingName.description: The code page name of the preferred encoding. If not provided, the default value is 'utf-8', unless the byte order mark (BOM) denotes another Unicode encoding. The full list of supported values can be found in the 'Name' column of the table of encodings in the following reference: https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.text.encoding.aspx#Anchor_5.

_88azureMLBatchExecutionActivity.description: Azure ML Batch Execution Service activity.
_88azureMLBatchExecutionActivity.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLBatchExecutionActivity

___globalParameters.description: Key,Value pairs to be passed to the Azure ML Batch Execution Service Endpoint Keys must match the names of web service parameters defined in the published Azure ML web service. Values may include ADF functions to be resolved at each slice execution time (See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn835056.aspx). Values will be passed in the GlobalParameters property of the Azure ML batch execution request.

___webServiceOutputs.description: Key,Value pairs mapping the Azure ML endpoint's Web Service Output names to names of ADF Blob Tables where the batch execution output should be written. This information will be passed in the WebServiceOutputs property of the Azure ML batch execution request. Mapped Tables must be included in the Activity's Outputs.

___webServiceInput.description: Name of ADF Blob Table giving the input to the batch execution. This information will be passed in the WebServiceInput property of the Azure ML batch execution request.

___typeProperties.description: .NET activity properties.

___extendedProperties.description: User defined property bag. There is no restriction on the keys or values that can be used. The user specified .NET activity has the full responsibility to consume and interpret the content defined.

___anchorDateTime.description: The date used as a reference point for calculating slice start and end dates.

___interval.description: The interval of running the scheduler.

___frequency.description: Frequency in terms of minute, hour, day, etc.

___offset.description: The offset relative to the anchor time.

___pipelineMode.description: The method of scheduling runs for the pipeline. 'Scheduled' indicates that the pipeline will run at a specified time interval according to its active period (start and end time). 'OneTime' indicates that the pipeline will run only once.

___start.description: The start time of the pipeline.

___isPaused.description: The status of the pipline. Pipeline is paused when boolean is set to true.

___activities.description: Activities that belong to the pipeline.

___expirationTime.description: Duration of time after creation for which the pipeline is valid and should remain provisioned. The pipeline will be deleted automatically once it reaches the expiration time if it does not have any active or pending runs.

___datasets.description: List of datasets to be used by activities defined in the pipeline. This can be used to define datasets that are specific to this pipeline and not defined within the data factory. Datasets defined within this pipeline can only be used by this pipeline and cannot be shared.

___end.description: The end time of the pipeline.

___hubName.description: The name of the Hub that this pipeline belongs to.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.
Properties specific to this dataset type.

___tableName.description: The table name of the Azure SQL database.

___concurrency.description: The maximum number of concurrent activity executions.

___executionPriorityOrder.description: Execution priority order.  Choose from OldestFirst or NewestFirst.

___timeout.description: Specifies the timeout for the activity to run. If there is value specified, it takes the value of TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1) which means indefinite timeout.

___delay.description: Delay activity execution so that upstream activities can have extra time to finish.

___retry.description: Total number of short retries for a failed activity.

___longRetry.description: Total number of long retries after failed short retries.

___linkedServiceName.description: LinkedService name where the Activity Runs.

___anchorDateTime.description: The date used as a reference point for calculating slice start and end dates.

___interval.description: The interval of running the scheduler.

___frequency.description: Frequency in terms of minute, hour, day, etc.

___offset.description: The offset relative to the anchor time.

___consistencyLevel.description: The consistency level specifies how many Cassandra servers must respond to a read request before returning data to the client application. Cassandra checks the specified number of Cassandra servers for data to satisfy the read request. Must be one of cassandraSourceReadConsistencyLevels. The default value is 'ONE'. It is case-insensitive.

___encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

___authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the Cassandra database. Must be Basic or Anonymous.

___port.description: The TCP port number that the Cassandra server uses to listen for client connections. The default value is 9042.

___host.description: One or more IP addresses or host names of the Cassandra server. Specify a comma-separated list of IP addresses and/or host names if attempting to connect to multiple servers. Each server is a replica.

___typeProperties.description: Copy activity properties.

___linkedServiceName.description: Name of the Azure Storage or Storage SAS linked service used for interim staging. Must be specified if copy via staging is enbled.

___enableCompression.description: Specifies whether to use compression when copying data via an interim staging. Default value is false.

___path.description: The path to storage for storing the interim data

___stagingSettings.description: Specifies interim staging settings when EnableStaging is true.

___enableStaging.description: Specifies whether to copy data via an interim staging. Default value is false.

___parallelCopies.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions opened on the source or sink to avoid overloading the data store.

___cloudDataMovementUnits.description: Maximum number of cloud data movement units that can be used to perform this data movement.

___translator.description: Copy activity translator. If not specificed, tabular translator is used.

___sliceIdentifierColumnName.description: Name of the SQL column which is used to save slice identifier information, to support idempotent copy.
